pattern_to_intent.pattern: \b(i want|recommend|recommendation|what can i play|what to play|suggest a game|suggestion|recommendation|recommend a|looking for|recommendations|suggestions|suggest)\b

\b(i like|I love|i prefer|I enjoy|I'm a fan of|big fan of|huge fan|really like|im into|into|I'm into|I'm interested in|I'm interested|I'm passionate about|I'm passionate|I'm fond of|I'm fond|I'm keen on|I'm keen|I'm crazy about|I'm crazy|I'm mad about|I'm mad|I'm wild about|I'm wild|I'm nuts about|I'm nuts|I'm obsessed with|I'm obsessed|I'm addicted to|I'm addicted|I'm hooked on|I'm hooked|I'm a sucker for|I'm a sucker|i love|i play|i enjoy playing|i like playing|i'm a fan of playing|i'm a big fan of playing|i'm a huge fan of playing|i'm a fan of|I'm a big fan of|I'm a huge fan)\b

\b(tell me more|more info|more information|more details|details|tell me about|what is|what are|what's|what's the deal|what's the scoop|what's the story|what's the lowdown|what's the skinny|what's the 411|what's the info|what's the information|what's the details|what's the deal with|what's the scoop on|what's the story on|what's the lowdown on|what's the skinny on|what's the 411 on|what's the info on|what's the information on|what's the details on)\b
\b(hello|hi|howdy|what's up|hey|hiya|sup|hey there|good morning|good afternoon|good evening|how are you|what's good|what's happening|how's it going|salutations|hiya pal|morning|evening|hi there)\b
\b(goodbye|bye|farewell|see you later|see ya|later|talk to you later|adios|ciao|so long|peace out|take care|bye bye|goodnight)\b

recommend: I recommend {name}. What do you think?

pattern_to_platform.pattern: \b(gameboy color|gameboy colour|game boy color|gameboy colour|game-boy color|game-boy colour|gbc)\b
\b(switch|nintendo switch lite|nintendo switch|nintendo switch pro|nintendo switch|joycon)\b
\b(snes|super nintendo|super nes|nintendo super|super nintendo entertainment system|nes 2)\b
\b(xbox 360|xbox360|x360|x box 360|xbox three sixty|xbox three hundred and sixty)\b

\b(rpg|role playing|role-playing|role playing game|role-playing game|role playing games|role-playing games|roleplay|role play)\b

\b(beat em up|beat-em-up|beat em ups|beat-em-ups|beat em up game|beat em up games|beat-em-up game|beat-em-up games|beat 'em up|beat 'em ups|beat 'em up game|beat 'em up games|beat 'em-up|beat 'em-ups|beat 'em-up game|beat 'em-up games|hack and slash|hack-and-slash|hack and slash game|hack and slash games)\b
